text:
@DailyCaller @NYGovCuomo @andrewcuomo stop pointing fingers over your misdeeds! 

Over 6000 dead seniors after you ordered #COVID19 patients back to their nursing homes! Then your #StayAtHome order caused 66% of new #WuhanVirus cases to come from Home! You Governor have blood on your hands! https://t.co/ApV91hJlhL
